title.text: The Subjectival Surface-Syntactic Relation in Serbian

abstractContent.text: The paper focuses on the notion of (surface) syntactic subject in Serbian within the syntactic dependency framework of the Meaning-Text linguistic theory.
Properties of the subject are described and its text implementations illustrated with data from a variety of contemporary texts.

tableCaptions.text: Table 3: Implementation of the SyntSubj in Ser- bian
